headline: NYSE Owner ICE in Talks to Invest in MoonPay at Nearly $5 Billion Valuation
summary: Intercontinental Exchange (ICE), the company behind the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), is negotiating an investment in crypto payments firm MoonPay as part of a funding round that could value the company at approximately $5 billion, according to a recent Bloomberg report.The potential valuation marks a 47% increase from MoonPay’s ...

headline: Stablecoin Monthly Adjusted Volume Surpasses Visa and PayPal
summary: Stablecoins are now processing more adjusted volume each month than major payment networks such as Visa and PayPal, according to Delphi Digital. The firm described stablecoins as “the most important infrastructure story in crypto” due to rapid growth in usage and supply. Notably, by October, monthly adjusted stablecoin transaction volume ...

headline: PayPal (PYPL): Evaluating the Valuation as It Pursues a Utah Bank Charter and Expanded Lending Services
summary: PayPal Holdings (PYPL) just took a big swing at traditional banking by applying to launch PayPal Bank, a Utah chartered industrial lender with FDIC insurance, aiming to handle deposits and small business credit in house. See our latest analysis for PayPal Holdings. Even with buzz around PayPal Bank and partnerships in crypto and AI driven commerce, sentiment is still catching up. The share price return over the last year is sharply negative, while multi year total shareholder returns remain...
